statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE employee_id = 100;
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE performance_score < 70;
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE employee_id = 123 AND training_plan_id = 456;
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingPlan WHERE plan_description LIKE '%management%'

DELETE FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 2003;
DELETE FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_id = 100 AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM training_plans WHERE training_duration > 30 AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating < 3);
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_score < 70;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND department = 'IT'
DELETE FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_id IN (SELECT performance_id FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_score < 70)
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
DELETE FROM TrainingSession WHERE session_id = 100;
DELETE FROM TrainingSession WHERE session_date < '2021-10-01' AND performance_score < 80.00;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score <= 70.00 OR performance_date < '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_id = 1;
DELETE FROM completed_training WHERE completion_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM completed_training WHERE employee_id = 123 AND plan_id = 456;
DELETE FROM training_enrollment WHERE plan_id = 789 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
